teaser: German Chancellor Angela Merkel was re-elected over the weekend. West Hollywood bans fur sales, but is the move just a symbolic one? And new HOV toll lanes in Atlanta cost the city millions of dollars, but critics say they are creating an economic divide on the highway.
description: German Chancellor Angela Merkel was re-elected over the weekend. West Hollywood bans fur sales, but is the move just a symbolic one? And new HOV toll lanes in Atlanta cost the city millions of dollars, but critics say they are creating an economic divide on the highway.
byline: Jim Burress, Adrienne Hill, Theo Leggett, Jeff Tyler, Mark Garrison, Stacey Vanek Smith and Bruce Johnson
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, September 23, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, September 23, 2013
